summary: Applies nucleus (top‑p) filtering to a tensor of logits, keeping the smallest set of highest‑probability tokens whose cumulative probability meets or exceeds a specified cutoff and setting all other logits to a designated filter value, while ensuring at least a minimum number of tokens remain unfiltered.
business_intent: Provide TensorFlow models with a mechanism to control diversity and quality of generated text by restricting token sampling to a probability mass defined by top‑p.
